channel.title: ¬Run Server Help ¬
channel.description:
Hi, i have downloaded about 4 diffrent sources and all the same problem so it must be something i am doing,
Problem - I open the source and then i double click on runserver, and it opens up for about 3 seconds and closes.
Then When i click edit this comes up - ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- @echo off color 0a title Hiyascape v2 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-jdk-6.10.0-ga-bin.jar server
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I am using JDK 6 update 10
Any ideas on what to do or what to change.
Thanks - Ryan - If it will be easier to talk to me on MSN please ask me for my address
Ryan-

item.title: ¬Run Server Help ¬
item.dc:creator: @mr_luigi_77 mr luigi 77
item.description:
@mr_luigi_77 wrote:

Add pause at the end, after clicking ENTER.

Read full topic

item.title: ¬Run Server Help ¬
item.dc:creator: @puke puke
item.description:
@puke wrote:

got it running -

Also - Do i HAVE to port-forward if i wanted to run my server wired
- Do i HAVE to port-forward if i want to get my own ip - example.no-ip.org ?? - if not refer me to a tut or explain please - Thanks

Ryan

Read full topic

item.title: ¬Run Server Help ¬
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:4, topic:244896”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=321303.msg2541409#msg2541409 date=1227030233]

i see the problem delete the color 0a or a shater way copy and paste this into ur runserver.bat,…

@echo off
title Hiyascape v2
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.10.0-ga-bin.jar server
that shud work if it doesent reply back,… ;D

Colors don’t effect anything. Add a pause under the last line, and run the batch file again, and tell us what it says.
[/quote]

he doesent need a pause button bcuz i dont have 1 and myn works :o[/quote]

The pause is to stop the batch file from closing after a few seconds, so he can see the error.

Read full topic
